ingredients: 2 large carrots, julienned (1/8- x 1/8- x 3-inch strips)
1 small red bell pepper, julienned (1/8- x 1/8- x 3-inch strips)
1 small bok choy, thinly sliced (about 3 cups)
1 to 2 tsp. finely chopped fresh ginger OR 1/4 tsp. ground ginger
4 ounces lo mein noodles OR thin spaghetti, cooked according to package directions
